title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Collaborative Project Based on Animal Science Capstone Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will complete collaborative projects by applying a 10-step design thinking process to solve animal science field problems.
Learners will demonstrate effective communication and leadership skills in team-based problem-solving processes.
Learners will articulate practical problem-solving strategies in animal science through project outcomes with linguistic clarity.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
